## Collaborations

* [__HDR Catalyst Project__](https://www.nsf.gov/awardsearch/showAward?AWD_ID=1940124&HistoricalAwards=false) | Nov 2019 - Present | Ithaca, NY\
Collaborate with groups of:
    * [__Prof. Roberto Rivera__](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=0HEAaC4AAAAJ&hl=en): propose and adapt hidden Markov models to dynamically cluster nanoparticle atomic structural configurations.

    * [__Prof. Peter A. Crozier__](https://crozier.engineering.asu.edu/people/peter-a-crozier/): adapt blob detection algorithm to extract locations and intensities of atomic columns.

    * [__Prof. Mahmoud Moradi__](https://bslgroup.hosted.uark.edu/members.shtml): refine the estimators of Markov chain transition rate matrices from transition probability matrices.


* Heart Failure Project | Dec 2021 - Present | Ithaca, NY\
Collaborate with [New York-Presbyterian (NYP) Hospital](https://www.nyp.org/) to conduct patients' heart failure inference from Electrocardiograms (ECG) data with other hospital-visit records.


* Thyroid Cancer Project | Dec 2022 - Present | Ithaca, NY\
Collaborate with [Denise Lee, MD](https://profiles.mountsinai.org/denise-t-lee) to predict Differentiated Thyroid Cancer (DTC) recurrence.
